title: AstrBot Enhanced Chat Summary Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration options for the enhanced chat summary plugin

language.title: Language
language.description: The language to use for the plugin interface

summary_format.title: Summary Format
summary_format.description: The format to use for the chat summary

summary_length.title: Summary Length
summary_length.description: The length of the generated summary

include_timestamps.title: Include Timestamps
include_timestamps.description: Whether to include timestamps in the summary

include_participants.title: Include Participants
include_participants.description: Whether to include participant names in the summary

highlight_keywords.title: Highlight Keywords
highlight_keywords.description: Whether to highlight important keywords in the summary

auto_save.title: Auto Save
auto_save.description: Whether to automatically save summaries to the specified directory

save_directory.title: Save Directory
save_directory.description: The directory to save summaries to (if auto-save is enabled)

max_message_count.title: Maximum Message Count
max_message_count.description: The maximum number of messages to include in the summary

ignore_system_messages.title: Ignore System Messages
ignore_system_messages.description: Whether to ignore system messages in the summary

debug_mode.title: Debug Mode
debug_mode.description: Enable debug mode for more verbose logging

api_timeout.title: API Timeout
api_timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for API requests
